text: Thanks to Zikry who helped my husband arranging this surprise birthday experience for me and I have indeed an awesome experience on this trial morning flight within Spore sky.  The pilot has patiently explained how to fly a plane and enjoyed the beautiful scenery in the boundary sky.  The best part is I can participate in landing the plane.
Excellent place to learn and experience flying in Singapore. Great instructors, friendly community :)
Only Affordable place to get a CAAS PPL in Singapore.  Great instructors and encouraging peers üëçüèªüëçüèª
Despite a small wait on tarmac for fuel, it  was overall a wonderful experience, highly recommend this to every flying enthusiast. Very friendly and professional instructor too.
Great place to learn and fly in Singapore!
